metadata.Title: CVE-2019-2636 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server component of Oracle MySQL (subcomponent:Server: Group Replication Plugin). Supported versions that are affected are8.0.15 and prior. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows high privilegedattacker with network access via MySQL Procotol to compromise MySQL Server.Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized abilityto cause a hang or frequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of MySQLServer. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 4.4 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

criterions.comment: mariadb-5.5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
percona-xtradb-cluster-5.5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
